website_summaries.verdict: Wire-brush finish gives this table a classic solid-wood look.
pros: A square end table that's a breeze to assemble and has a lower shelf
This simple style is understated and goes with anything
22 inches wide by 22 inches deep by 24 inches high
cons: The color may vary, and if you want a solid wood table, look elsewhere

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Looks great in my spare bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: I redid a spare bedroom in a country theme, and needed a table to go next to the bed. This fit perfectly with the decor and the size is just right. The finish looks kind of like barn wood - A light tan color. This piece of furniture is heavy and sturdy. I am a 53-year-old woman, and found this very easy to assemble. It looks lovely in the room.
customer_reviews.author: ees

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the table
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the table. It arrived quickly and was packaged well along with all hardware, instructions, and wrench. It was somewhat time-consuming to assemble, but everything finally locked into place and it's very sturdy. The color and size works well for my needs. It seems to be real wood with a hard plastic covering. I hope it wears well. I looked everywhere on the product information about care of it but cannot find anything. I suppose it will be OK to clean it with soap and water but not sure. Also not sure whether coasters are needed for hot drinks - probably so.
customer_reviews.author: M Scott

customer_reviews.title: NOT solid wood!
customer_reviews.text: I think this table is adorable but when it arrived and I pulled the top from the box I immediately noticed it is not solid wood. The top is pressed wood with a laminate glued to it. The seller did not clarify in the listing whether or not it was solid but when I read the "questions" section everyone stated it is in fact solid wood. Also, the color description is quite off. It is more of a light brown color. If you are looking for something that is quality and looks weathered like the photo I advise you to look at something else.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table looked exactly like I expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table looked exactly like I expected. Easy to assemble and there was very little wobble which I took care of with a pad under one leg. This is a very strong table and not rickety at all. It appear to be a molded composite but looks like real wood and should last far longer than cheap laminated tables. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Zaldavar

customer_reviews.title: The finishing looks classy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this table to sit in the entry of an office and it looks great! The old-style looking finish is just as advertised and very classy. The table is sturdy and does not tilt or wobble when you set items on it. I really like this piece of furniture and am considering ordering another one for my home.
customer_reviews.author: Traci P

customer_reviews.title: Love this end table.
customer_reviews.text: I love this end table so much I ordered a second one. I bought both from Amazon's warehouse sale so I didn't pay the original price. I put the table together by myself even though the directions say it takes two people. It was easy to put together and looks exactly like picture.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: I knew from the reviews that they wouldn't be solid/real wood grain but they look more fake than I would like. I've seen better
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. I knew from the reviews that they wouldn't be solid/real wood grain but they look more fake than I would like. I've seen better. They will serve our purposes though. The tone is more yellow than what it appears in the listing. I realize all monitors vary in color though.
customer_reviews.author: Adoptive Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not the color in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I have the rustic brown shown in the picture on the left. This end table is has more of a green tone to it than a brown tone. I will be returning it as it is not the color that is in the advertised picture.
customer_reviews.author: David Weltman

customer_reviews.title: I gave if five stars not for being an heirloom piece of furniture but for being a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Goes together very quickly with just 8 screws. No talent for putting together box furniture needed. Table is solid and after buying two I can confidently say the finish is close to the picture. I gave if five stars not for being an heirloom piece of furniture but for being a great value.
customer_reviews.author: The Honest Review Guy

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to put together and are very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the end tables. They were easy to put together and are very sturdy. The reason I gave four stars instead of five was because as stated in other reviews the color is different than what is shown in the picture. Also the two tables defer in appearance from each other, one is more white and gray the other has less whitewashed on it, however, since I was looking for a rustic appearance I'm okay with these variations.
customer_reviews.author: Lisanne

customer_reviews.title: Great pieces - but the smell is overbearing and toxic!
customer_reviews.text: Ok great looking and so easy to put together! It's solid and quite substantial ! These will last a long time! The issue is the extremely toxic smell! It smells like it was just stained and it's so toxic :( I have windows open and fan on- hoping I don't get sick from inhaling the fumes! Not sure how you can have it stink this bad... Are there no laws in China or standards with Ashley that can avoid this? I've never smelled anything like it before! I hope it calms down a bit by tomorrow :/ else I will have to leave outside until it goes away!
customer_reviews.author: This game is good

customer_reviews.title: Color check
customer_reviews.text: Solid! The color is yellowy brown, but I still like it. Works for my eclectic taste. It's solid though. My kid can jump on it, and it'll be fine. Yet, it pleases my taste for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a bear to put toget her and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a bear to put toget her and the table legs don't fit into the notches properly. But I did manage to get it together...not without a few cuss words.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good deal! Quality is great and set up is ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good deal! Quality is great and set up is very easy. I plan on purchasing the rest of the set.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Solid little table! Way better than expected. It looks exactly the same as what you see. It's built well...very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Loved this table from the moment I assembled it
customer_reviews.text: Loved this table from the moment I assembled it! Very cool rustic or nautical looking table. It is a heavy sturdy piece & it is fun to decorate the bottom shelf too! I have decorated it for Fall & Christmas & get many compliments on it! Great table for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Used in a restaurant. High quality, durable finish and solid (could probably stand on it) compared to the cheaply built Shine tables I have.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great match to the secretary. Had one already and bought another to use as nightstands. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: mln

customer_reviews.title: you'll more than likely get something that doesn't look like the picture
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, you'll more than likely get something that doesn't look like the picture. Mine has no whitewash to it at all, it's just a dark wood table....not very "vintage".
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous tables
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these tables because of their weight & shabby chic appearance. Granted the tables are a bit darker (more tan) than the image but it still fits in with our decor so it's fine. We needed something that was sturdy, heavy, would show very little wear and great looking. I'm very pleased with this purchase and it's an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Great, attractive and sturdy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these because we have 2 living rooms in our home and needed spots for our table lamps. These tables are FABULOUS! They're very heavy and very sturdy...and absolutely perfect with our decor! Love shabby chic!! Also very easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Amber S

customer_reviews.title: Very solid table.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid table for the price. Came quickly it and exactly as I expected. Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving the reclaimed look!
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS!!! Exactly like the picture! Perfect "reclaimed" look. I paired it with dark leather furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Cjohnson

customer_reviews.title: I like this table
customer_reviews.text: I like this table. Sturdy. But opened the box and the packing BEADS when all over my rug, floor and down stairs!! Took me 2 hrs to get them all up. Pain in the ass. !!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Retondo

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Darker than pictured but I ordered them banking on them bring darker based on other reviews I had read. They ended up being the perfect shade and are very solid and sturdy. Definitely recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brauer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: rustic looking end tables. Are slightly more yellow, then photo in picture, but compliment most rustic looking decor
customer_reviews.author: Flyguy

customer_reviews.title: just what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: heavy very sturdy well built tables. looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Ira Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with look! Solid wood and rustic! Priced at $150 at Ashley furniture, great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute beachy end table
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy beach/ cottage themed table, and easy to put together. Using it as a night stand in my Nantucket themed bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: yaratr

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: was missing hardware to connect the leg to the table -_____-
customer_reviews.author: betty ann

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece! Wondering if hey make it a bit wider? Mahalo
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz T.

customer_reviews.title: Color doesn’t match picture
customer_reviews.text: Coloring in picture does not match coloring in person. In the picture it looks more white washed and rustic but in person is more of a yellow-ish coloring and does not look distressed. Easy to put together and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anne T

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the table for the price. I agree with the previous reviews that the actual table is darker than pictured, with more yellow tones, but still ordered the table with that in mind. I have a 1 year old and wanted something durable that would not show signs of wear with the occasional beating. I can tell these fit the bill perfectly. Easy to put together and very sturdy. I have no fear with the pets and toddler around them. I shopped around quite a bit before purchasing and these are nicer than many of the tables I had seen in store.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love my table. It is just what the description said
customer_reviews.author: satch

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, Sturdy, simple to assemble and color is true to picture. I would recommend it to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Was way larger than I expected it to be which was a plus!
customer_reviews.author: StaciaV

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well built table
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well built table. Attractive and actually a higher quality than we expected. We liked it so much that we purchased a second one.
customer_reviews.author: ross2761

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than the photo ... sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Steven V. Carleton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this table!! Quick delivery, easy to put together, good quality, just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Paight

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Very nice sturdy heavy tables. Easy to assemble too. Definitely worth the price! I'm hoping to add the matching coffee table soon.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Tries to return this item. Was told I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Tries to return this item . Was told I had to pay return shipping which was $46! Color was off and it was too big for the space we needed it for .
customer_reviews.author: bride 11

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy table. Easy assembly too! Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Teal

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These tables look great, arrived quickly and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: KATHERINE BOYD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality..... More of a dark tan color in person.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love these tables
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love these tables. Very easy to put together and it's well made. the color is a bit more tan than gray as it appears in this photo....
customer_reviews.author: treasa kling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I got it early and I'm completely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Table!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table! Perfect for a 4' Christmas tree, exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: the amp wont get tipped over and no drinks can get spilled on it so it perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: my Fender Bronco 40 fits perfectly under this and I can sit on it and play guitar or ukulele or bass.. the amp wont get tipped over and no drinks can get spilled on it so it perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

product_meta.title: Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Vintage Chair Side End Table - Rustic Brown
product_meta.description: Relaxed and casual, this accent table has details that make a statement in the environment we choose to live in. Dimensions: 22" W x 22" D x 24" H, Bottom shelf to top apron: 13 3/4".
feature_bullets: VERSATILE ACCENT TABLE: Rustic chic rectangular side table with a lower fixed shelf for stashing blankets, books and remotes. Clean lines and driftwood-like finish are a natural match for any traditional or contemporary living room
NATURAL BEAUTY: Coffee table crafted from veneers, wood and manmade wood.
SPACIOUS TABLETOP: End table measures 22"W x 22"D x 24"H
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, hardware and tools included

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries, The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses, For every taste and budget, Since 1945

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars74 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
